body.p: This Basis for Conclusions summarises the International Accounting Standards Board’s considerations in reaching its conclusions on issuing IAS 27 Consolidated and Separate Financial Statements in 2003, and amending IAS 27 in 2008 and again in 2011. Individual Board members gave greater weight to some factors than to others. Unless otherwise noted, references below to IAS 27 are to previous versions of the Standard.
